sources.title: The Show
sources.description: Title: The Show Summary: A harried propman backstage at a theater must put up with malfunctioning wind machines, roosters that spit nitroglycerine, and a gang planning to rob the theater's payroll. Directed by: Larry Semon, Norman Taurog Actors: Production Company: Larry Semon Productions Release Date: 19 March 1922 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A harried propman backstage at a theater must put up with malfunctioning wind machines, roosters that spit nitroglycerine, and a gang planning to rob the theater's payroll.
